title: Jaipur, Rajasthan
description: Known as the Pink City, Jaipur is famous for its forts, palaces, and vibrant culture.

title: Goa
description: A tropical paradise with stunning beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.

title: Kerala Backwaters
description: A serene network of lagoons and lakes, perfect for houseboat cruises.

title: Agra, Uttar Pradesh
description: Home to the iconic Taj Mahal, a symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

title: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh
description: A spiritual city on the banks of the Ganges, known for its ghats and temples.

title: Munnar, Kerala
description: A hill station famous for its tea plantations, lush greenery, and cool climate.

title: Leh-Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir
description: A high-altitude desert known for its stunning landscapes, monasteries, and adventure sports.

title: Rishikesh, Uttarakhand
description: The Yoga Capital of the World, nestled in the Himalayas along the Ganges River.

title: Darjeeling, West Bengal
description: Famous for its tea gardens, toy train, and views of the Kanchenjunga mountain range.

title: Hampi, Karnataka
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site with ancient ruins, temples, and boulder-strewn landscapes.
